title: Question for all people
body:
Why isn't Twisted Treeline on the Ranked times? Or avalible on Ranked whatsoever????
I'm just wondering. Oh and if you give me an answer that is "Cause it's not popular enough." then well, why make it a map when it's never really played as much as the other 2 maps. (Obviously excludes the Crystal Scar).

replies.body:
[A comment from a red recently](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/JbRfVZWe-twisted-treeline-in-oce-only-on-at-specific-times)

> [{quoted}](name=Sephyre,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=JbRfVZWe,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-09-02T05:43:45.879+0000)
>

> 
> The reason Twisted Treeline isn't on all the time is because our server isn't quite big enough yet to support it full time. We review the numbers regularly and if it does get to the point where we can expand the availability window we will announce it on here.


[Schedules can be found here](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/HAK2vcae-twisted-treeline-team-builder-and-ranked-sr-schedule)


> [{quoted}](name=Sephyre,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=HAK2vcae,comment-id=,timestamp=2014-11-18T23:15:07.371+0000)
> **Twisted Treeline:**
> 
> Thursday: 3:00pm - 1:00am AEDT
> 
> Friday: 3:00pm - 1:00am AEDT
> 
> Saturday: 3:00pm - 1:00am AEDT
It is opened sometimes, but very rarely, usually when a patch comes out for a day or so.
